pkgmetadata.longdescription: Processing and Visualization of Visual Plankton Recorder Data // An oceanographic data processing package for analyzing and visualizing Video Plankton Recorder data. Works in concert with Visual Plankton (MATLAB) software developed at 'WHOI'. This package was developed at 'Bedford Institute of Oceanography'. Functions are designed to process Visual Plankton output and create organized and easily portable data products.
